refnamediv.refpurpose: the command line interface to iNA

refsect1.title: Description

para.command: ina-cli provides a easy to use command line interface to iNA. This tool is distributed along with the iNA GUI application. It allows to perform analyses from command line, thus also on remote machines via SSH.

refsect1.para: This tool implements the following operations and analyses:

listitem.para: Setting of initial values for parameters, compartments and species,
Listing of parameters, species and compartments.

refsect1.para: The analyses results can be exported as either CSV into a file or printed to stdout. Alternatively, the analyses results might be exported into a Matlat MAT file.
